dashboardPage.description: Here's your farm's overview for today.
dashboardPage.processDescription: From data to decision, see how AgriPredict empowers your farming.

diseaseDetection.title: AI Disease Detection
diseaseDetection.description: Upload a leaf image to get an instant diagnosis of crop diseases.

marketPrices.title: Market Price Insights
marketPrices.description: Compare real-time mandi prices to sell your produce at the best rate.

profitForecasting.title: Profit Forecasting
profitForecasting.description: Estimate your potential profits before harvest with our AI engine.

advisories.delhi: High temperatures expected. Ensure adequate irrigation for crops.
advisories.mumbai: Heavy rainfall predicted. Check for waterlogging in fields and ensure proper drainage.
advisories.bangalore: Cloudy with intermittent showers. Good time for planting new crops.

diseaseDetectionPage.title: AI Disease Detection
diseaseDetectionPage.description: Upload a photo of a crop leaf to get an instant diagnosis and treatment recommendations.

diseaseDetectionForm.submitDescription: Upload a clear image of the affected leaf.
diseaseDetectionForm.uploadPlaceholder: Click or drag file to upload
diseaseDetectionForm.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., 'Yellow spots appeared 3 days ago on lower leaves...'
diseaseDetectionForm.analyzingDescription: Our AI is inspecting the leaf. Please wait a moment.
diseaseDetectionForm.errorAnalyzing: An error occurred while analyzing the image. Please try again.
diseaseDetectionForm.errorReadingFile: Failed to read the image file.
diseaseDetectionForm.awaitingDescription: Your diagnosis report will appear here.

marketPricesPage.title: Real-time Mandi Prices
marketPricesPage.description: Compare prices across different markets to maximize your profit.
marketPricesPage.trendDescription: Price fluctuation for major crops over the last week (per Quintal).

profitEstimatorPage.title: Profit Estimation Engine
profitEstimatorPage.description: Forecast your potential profit based on crop data and market conditions.

profitEstimatorForm.title: Enter Crop Details
profitEstimatorForm.description: Provide the following details to estimate your potential profit.
profitEstimatorForm.marketDataPlaceholder: e.g., 'Current mandi price is around 2400/quintal, demand is high due to festive season...'
profitEstimatorForm.calculatingDescription: Our AI is running the numbers. Please wait a moment.
profitEstimatorForm.errorEstimating: An error occurred while estimating profit. Please try again.
profitEstimatorForm.analysisDescription: AI-powered financial forecast for your crop.
profitEstimatorForm.awaitingDescription: Your profit forecast will appear here.

priceAlert.title: Price Alert: Wheat
priceAlert.description: Wheat prices in Khanna, Punjab have dropped by 0.5%. View market prices for details.

diseaseDetected.title: Disease Detected: Tomato
diseaseDetected.description: Potential case of Late Blight detected in your recent upload. Check the report.

locationSuccess.title: Location Set
locationSuccess.description: Weather is now showing for your closest city: {location}.

locationError.title: Unable to Access Location
locationError.description: Please grant location permission in your browser to use this feature.
